title: First Night
description: When a Nightmare is on the loose, the Oneiro Rangers are on the case! Normlock, a city filled with dark corners and deep alleys, made in a world covered by the dominant night sky. Nightmares, creatures made of our most horrifying dreams, coming to life and running amok. Combining horror and noir, First Night is just the beginning to the much awaited Oneiro Rangers series.
author: Erwin Blackthorn
